hyperparameters.name: n_estimators
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of base estimators in the ensemble.

hyperparameters.name: max_samples
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of samples to draw from X to train each base estimator as % of total number of samples.

hyperparameters.name: max_features
hyperparameters.short_desc: The number of features to draw from X to train each base estimator as % of total number of features.
